articles.title: What is happening with the Central Square sign?
articles.description:
The artists behind the iconic landmark took the sign down for some rehab, but it will soon return to its glory with a party to boot.

summary: Artists removed the Central Square sign for restoration and maintenance.
The sign will return with a celebratory event planned for the community.
Residents can look forward to the revitalized landmark enhancing local culture.
